title: Do we have to stop talking or  cover head / hair during the Azaan? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: they think and they believe that when the ad is given everything has to be halted so if you are working you should stop doing whatever you are doing and if you are for example um speaking with someone you have to refrain from talking if your head is uncovered if you are a woman you have to cover your hair all of this is baseless
